channel.title: I need help fixing this ****
channel.description: I get this on my complier well trying to fix my whip spec I have triead many thing's and still not fixed. [code] client.java:7282: illegal start of expression public void createProjectilez(int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int gfxMoving, ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: I need help fixing this ****
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

I tried that That it was I though also I also tried replacing the , with a ;
Here is what I added.

public boolean whipDMG = false; public boolean Whip = false; public void WhipSpecial() { if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && SpecialDelay >= 4 ) { int j = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int l = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int j1 = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP; SpecDamgNPC(50); stillgfx(341, l, j); setAnimation(1658); actionTimer = 6; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecialDelay -= 4; } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && SpecialDelay >= 4 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int i1 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int k1 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = misc.random(40); stillgfx(251, i1, k); setAnimation(1060); SpecDamg(36); actionTimer = 6; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("The abbysal Whip Pulls the Enemy in to the HELL!!"); SpecialDelay -= 4; } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && SpecialDelay >= 4 && !Whip) Whip = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && SpecialDelay >= 4 && Whip) Whip = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); } public void CheckBar() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && !Whip) sendQuest("S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && Whip) sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L A T T A C K", 12335); }
This is what it look’s like now.

[br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2007, 08:39:49 PM[/size][hr]So People don’t know how to fix it?
I got a 100 error for adding a bracket lol.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2007, 08:57:28 PM[/size][hr]still need some help.
